TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Ports extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供屬性和方法，以存取電腦的序列連接埠。

span.span: Provides a property and a method for accessing the computer's serial ports.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Ports`物件來存取提供簡單的進入點[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]序列連接埠類別。The `My.Computer.Ports` object provides a straightforward entry point for accessing the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] serial port class, . 下表列出包含工作的範例`My.Computer.Ports`物件。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Ports` object. |以To|請參閱See| |-|-| |撥號數據機連接到序列連接埠Dial a modem attached to a serial port|[如何：撥接與序列埠連接的數據機How to: Dial Modems Attached to Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-dial-modems-attached-to-serial-ports.md)| |將字串傳送至序列埠Send a string to a serial port|[如何：將字串傳送至序列埠How to: Send Strings to Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-send-strings-to-serial-ports.md)| |接收來自序列埠的字串Receive strings from a serial port|[如何：接收來自序列埠的字串How to: Receive Strings From Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-receive-strings-from-serial-ports.md)| |顯示可用的序列埠Show available serial ports|[如何：顯示可用的序列埠How to: Show Available Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-show-available-serial-ports.md)| ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例說明如何將字串傳送至電腦的`COM1`序列連接埠。This example describes how to send strings to the computer's `COM1` serial port. `Using` 區塊允許應用程式即使產生例外狀況，也可關閉序列埠。The `Using` block allows the application to close the serial port even if it generates an exception. 資料序列埠的所有程式碼應該會出現在這個區塊中，或在`Try...Catch...Finally`區塊呼叫使用方法。All code that manipulates the serial port should appear within this block, or within a `Try...Catch...Finally` block with a call to use the method. 方法會將資料傳送至序列埠。The method sends the data to the serial port. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#33](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class2.vb#33)] 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 將字串傳送至序列埠](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-send-strings-to-serial-ports.md)。For more information, see [How to: Send Strings to Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-send-strings-to-serial-ports.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public Ports ();
.method public specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Public Sub New ()
public: Ports();

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.IO.Ports.SerialPort OpenSerialPort (string portName);
.method public instance class System.IO.Ports.SerialPort OpenSerialPort(string portName) cil managed
Public Function OpenSerialPort (portName As String) As SerialPort
public: System::IO::Ports::SerialPort ^ OpenSerialPort(System::String ^ portName);

span.span: Name of the port to open.

returns.span: 開放式 物件，使用提供的引數進行設定。

span.span: An open object, configured with the supplied arguments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Ports.OpenSerialPort`方法會建立並開啟物件。The `My.Computer.Ports.OpenSerialPort` method creates and opens a object. 引數`OpenSerialPort`方法會決定的設定物件。The arguments to the `OpenSerialPort` method determine the settings of the object. 您的程式碼應該關閉物件完成時使用的物件。Your code should close the object when it is finished using the object. 您可以使用方法，明確關閉該物件或`Using`陳述式來以隱含方式關閉它。You can use the method to close the object explicitly or the `Using` statement to close it implicitly. 如需詳細資訊，本主題中的範例，請參閱。See the example in this topic for more information. 下表列出包含工作的範例`My.Computer.Ports.OpenSerialPort`方法。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Ports.OpenSerialPort` method. |以To|請參閱See| |-|-| |撥號數據機連接到序列連接埠Dial a modem attached to a serial port|[如何：撥接與序列埠連接的數據機How to: Dial Modems Attached to Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-dial-modems-attached-to-serial-ports.md)| |將字串傳送至序列埠Send a string to serial port|[如何：將字串傳送至序列埠How to: Send Strings to Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-send-strings-to-serial-ports.md)| |接收來自序列埠的字串Receive strings from a serial port|[如何：接收來自序列埠的字串How to: Receive Strings From Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-receive-strings-from-serial-ports.md)| ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例說明如何將字串傳送至電腦的`COM1`序列連接埠。This example describes how to send strings to the computer's `COM1` serial port. `Using` 區塊允許應用程式即使產生例外狀況，也可關閉序列埠。The `Using` block allows the application to close the serial port even if it generates an exception. 資料序列埠的所有程式碼應該會出現在這個區塊中，或在`Try...Catch...Finally`區塊呼叫使用方法。All code that manipulates the serial port should appear within this block, or within a `Try...Catch...Finally` block with a call to use the method. 方法會將資料傳送至序列埠。The method sends the data to the serial port. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#33](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class2.vb#33)] 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 將字串傳送至序列埠](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-send-strings-to-serial-ports.md)。For more information, see [How to: Send Strings to Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-send-strings-to-serial-ports.md).

.method public instance class System.IO.Ports.SerialPort OpenSerialPort(string portName, int32 baudRate) cil managed
Public Function OpenSerialPort (portName As String, baudRate As Integer) As SerialPort
public: System::IO::Ports::SerialPort ^ OpenSerialPort(System::String ^ portName, int baudRate);

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Ports.OpenSerialPort`方法會建立並開啟物件。The `My.Computer.Ports.OpenSerialPort` method creates and opens a object. 引數`OpenSerialPort`方法會決定的設定物件。The arguments to the `OpenSerialPort` method determine the settings of the object. 您的程式碼應該關閉物件完成時使用的物件。Your code should close the object when it is finished using the object. 您可以使用方法，明確關閉該物件或`Using`陳述式來以隱含方式關閉它。You can use the method to close the object explicitly or the `Using` statement to close it implicitly. 如需詳細資訊，本主題中的範例，請參閱。See the example in this topic for more information. 下表列出包含工作的範例`My.Computer.Ports.OpenSerialPort`方法。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Ports.OpenSerialPort` method. |以To|請參閱See| |-|-| |撥號數據機連接到序列連接埠Dial a modem attached to a serial port|[如何：撥接與序列埠連接的數據機How to: Dial Modems Attached to Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-dial-modems-attached-to-serial-ports.md)| |將字串傳送至序列埠Send a string to serial port|[如何：將字串傳送至序列埠How to: Send Strings to Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-send-strings-to-serial-ports.md)| |接收來自序列埠的字串Receive strings from a serial port|[如何：接收來自序列埠的字串How to: Receive Strings From Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-receive-strings-from-serial-ports.md)| ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例說明如何將字串傳送至電腦的`COM1`序列連接埠。This example describes how to send strings to the computer's `COM1` serial port. `Using` 區塊允許應用程式即使產生例外狀況，也可關閉序列埠。The `Using` block allows the application to close the serial port even if it generates an exception. 資料序列埠的所有程式碼應該會出現在這個區塊中，或在`Try...Catch...Finally`區塊呼叫使用方法。All code that manipulates the serial port should appear within this block, or within a `Try...Catch...Finally` block with a call to use the method. 方法會將資料傳送至序列埠。The method sends the data to the serial port. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#33](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class2.vb#33)] 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 將字串傳送至序列埠](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-send-strings-to-serial-ports.md)。For more information, see [How to: Send Strings to Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-send-strings-to-serial-ports.md).

span.span: is less than or equal to zero.

exception.span: 不是其中一個 列舉值。

span.span: is not one of the enumeration values.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<string> SerialPortNames { get; }
.property instance class System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1<string> SerialPortNames
Public ReadOnly Property SerialPortNames As ReadOnlyCollection(Of String)
public: property System::Collections::ObjectModel::ReadOnlyCollection<System::String ^> ^ SerialPortNames { System::Collections::ObjectModel::ReadOnlyCollection<System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得電腦上序列埠名稱的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the names of the serial ports on the computer.

value.span: 電腦上序列埠的名稱集合。

span.span: A collection of the names of the serial ports on the computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Ports.SerialPortNames`屬性會取得電腦上的序列埠名稱的集合。The `My.Computer.Ports.SerialPortNames` property gets a collection of the names of the serial ports on the computer. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows 98 上執行時，`My.Computer.Ports.SerialPortNames` 所傳回的序列埠名稱可能不正確。The port names returned by `My.Computer.Ports.SerialPortNames` may be incorrect when run on Windows 98. 為了避免應用程式錯誤，請在使用序列埠名稱開啟序列埠時，使用例外狀況處理，例如 `Try...Catch...Finally` 陳述式或 `Using` 陳述式。To prevent application errors, use exception handling, such as the `Try...Catch...Finally` statement or the `Using` statement, when using the port names to open ports. 下表列出的工作，包含範例`My.Computer.Ports.SerialPortNames`屬性。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.Ports.SerialPortNames` property. |以To|請參閱See| |-|-| |顯示可用的序列埠Show available serial ports|[如何：顯示可用的序列埠How to: Show Available Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-show-available-serial-ports.md)| ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此範例會針對 `My.Computer.Ports.SerialPortNames` 屬性傳回的所有字串執行迴圈。This example loops over all the strings that the `My.Computer.Ports.SerialPortNames` property returns. 這些字串是電腦上可用序列埠的名稱。These strings are the names of the available serial ports on the computer. 一般而言，使用者會從可用的序列埠清單中，選取應用程式應該使用的序列埠。Typically, a user selects which serial port the application should use from the list of available ports. 在這個範例中，序列埠名稱會儲存在 控制項中。In this example, the serial port names are stored in a control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [ListBox 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/listbox-control-windows-forms.md)。For more information, see [ListBox Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/listbox-control-windows-forms.md). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#45](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class2.vb#45)] 這個範例需要：This example requires: - 命名空間的參考。A reference to the namespace. - 您的表單會有名為 `ListBox1` 的 控制項。That your form have a control named `ListBox1`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：顯示可用的序列埠](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-show-available-serial-ports.md)。For more information, see [How to: Show Available Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-show-available-serial-ports.md).
